6 //typedef SimpleWeb::SocketServer<SimpleWeb::WS> WsServer;
7 typedef SimpleWeb::SocketClient<SimpleWeb::WS> WsClient;
8 
9 int main() {
10 
11  WsClient client("localhost:9090");
12 
13  client.on_open=[&client]() {
14  cout << "Client: Opened connection" << endl;
15 
16  string message="1";
17  cout << "Client: Sending message: \"" << message << "\"" << endl;
18 
19  auto send_stream=make_shared<WsClient::SendStream>();
20  *send_stream << message;
21  client.send(send_stream);
22  };
23 
24  client.on_message=[&client](shared_ptr<WsClient::Message> message) {
25  auto message_str=message->string();
26 
27  cout << "Client: Message received: \"" << message_str << "\"" << endl;
28 
29  cout << "Client: Sending close connection" << endl;
30  client.send_close(1000);
31  };
32 
33  client.on_close=[](int status, const string& /*reason*/) {
34  cout << "Client: Closed connection with status code " << status << endl;
35  };
36 
37  //See http://www.boost.org/doc/libs/1_55_0/doc/html/boost_asio/reference.html, Error Codes for error code meanings
38  client.on_error=[](const SimpleWeb::error_code& ec) {
39  cout << "Client: Error: " << ec << ", error message: " << ec.message() << endl;
40  };
41 
42  client.start();
43 
44  return 0;
45 }
